Sentencas: Metal oxide films prepared by thin film technology have been reported for the potential applications on thin solid electrolyte layers for solid oxide fuel cells(SOFCs).
Titulo: Characteristics of Sputter-deposited Gadolinia-doped Ceria Thin Films on Al2O3/SiO2/Si Systems

Sentencas: Gadolinia-doped ceria(GDC) thin films and Al2O3 layers on SiO2/Si substrates are successively deposited by F-F reactive magnetron sputtering from a cerium-gadolinium (90: 10 at.%) alloy target and Al target in O-2/Ar gas mixture and then perform post-thermal treatments at 300-700 degrees C and 900 degrees C for 2 h, respectively.
Titulo: Characteristics of Sputter-deposited Gadolinia-doped Ceria Thin Films on Al2O3/SiO2/Si Systems

Sentencas: Materials characteristics and chemical compositions of GDC films and Al2O3 layers are investigated by X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy(XPS), cross-sectional scanning electron microscopy(SEM), X-ray diffraction(XRD), and atomic force microscopy(AFM).
Titulo: Characteristics of Sputter-deposited Gadolinia-doped Ceria Thin Films on Al2O3/SiO2/Si Systems

Sentencas: Stoichiometric Al2O3 layers with polycrystalline structures are firstly prepared onto SiO2/Si substrates.
Titulo: Characteristics of Sputter-deposited Gadolinia-doped Ceria Thin Films on Al2O3/SiO2/Si Systems

Sentencas: A cubic fluorite structure with columnar crystallites of GDC films is successfully deposited on Al2O3/SiO2/Si Systems.
Titulo: Characteristics of Sputter-deposited Gadolinia-doped Ceria Thin Films on Al2O3/SiO2/Si Systems

Sentencas: The chemical composition of 700 degrees C-annealed GDC films is (Ce0.91Gd0.09)O-1.94 and possesses a higher film density of 7.257 g/cm(3).
Titulo: Characteristics of Sputter-deposited Gadolinia-doped Ceria Thin Films on Al2O3/SiO2/Si Systems

Sentencas: As a result, GDC thin films prepared by RF reactive magnetron sputtering and post-thermal treatments can be used as thin solid electrolyte layers for intermediate temperature SOFCs system as compared to the well-known yttria-stabilized zirconia(YSZ).
Titulo: Characteristics of Sputter-deposited Gadolinia-doped Ceria Thin Films on Al2O3/SiO2/Si Systems
